name: Picultima-8
description:
Welcome to the small, small, small (small, small) world of Canadia! explore, and do other things (soon).

Picultima-8 is a De-Make of Ultima I: The First Age of Darkness. this game will not have all the features of it's source game but will have some new elements, and a new world to explore!

if you like the game, don't mind giving a small donation, it is greatly appreciated and will help me to further development of this game!
